ComicInfo.Penciller: Dave Johnson,Gray Morrow,Frank Miller,John Byrne,Frank Miller,Dave Johnson,John Byrne,Gray Morrow
ComicInfo.Summary: In chapter two of the prelude to John Byrne's The Next Men comic, the mutants wake up in a strange new world and discover everything they thought they knew is wrong! In Homicide, John Arcudi and Gray Morrow give Detective Ford a chance to the book on a ten-year-old case...or not. Then, Cliff Biggers, Brett Brooks and Dave Johnson unleash Earth Boys. What chance do four teenagers have against the untamed universe? Better yet...what chance does the universe have against them?! Finally, "Violent Marv" turns Frank Miller's Sin City upside down in his quest for Goldie's killer.
ComicInfo.Title: Sin City Episode Six; The Big Schlep; Interlude II; The Long Road to Truth
ComicInfo.Writer: Cliff Biggers,Frank Miller,John Arcudi,John Byrne,Brett Brooks,Frank Miller,Cliff Biggers,Brett Brooks,John Byrne,John Arcudi
